name: EPSD_FILED_SF
description: This table contains the IDs of SmartForms which have been filed for each episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: FILED_SF_ID
columns.description: The IDs of the SmartForms that have been filed for this episode.

columns.name: FILED_SF_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.
